eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine

Class AdvancePluginManager<T,X,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.AdvancePluginManager<T,X,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the runtime type of the dataflow
    X - the type system type
    C - the runtime context
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AdvancePluginManager<T,X,C>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The ADVANCE plugin manager to load and watch plugins from a plugin directory.

    A plugin is a JAR file with a block-registry.xml found in its root directory.

    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.11.17.

      • jarFile

        public static java.net.URL jarFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                            throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Create an URL from the given JAR filename location.

        Example: a file c:\lib\mylib.jar will be encoded as jar:file:/c:/lib/mylib.jar.

        Parameters:
        fileName - the filename
        Returns:
        the URL of the JAR file which can be used in the load() method.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - on error
